trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_FREEZE_DATABASE</codeph> system procedure temporarily freezes the database for backup.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_FREEZE_DATABASE</codeph> system procedure temporarily freezes the database for backup.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_FREEZE_DATABASE</codeph> system procedure temporarily freezes the database for backup.

trans-unit.source: See "Using operating system commands with the freeze and unfreeze system procedures to perform an online backup" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> for more information on using this procedure.

seg-source.mrk: See "Using operating system commands with the freeze and unfreeze system procedures to perform an online backup" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> for more information on using this procedure.

target.mrk: See "Using operating system commands with the freeze and unfreeze system procedures to perform an online backup" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> for more information on using this procedure.

trans-unit.source: No result set is returned by this procedure.

seg-source.mrk: No result set is returned by this procedure.

target.mrk: No result set is returned by this procedure.

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

target.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

trans-unit.source: String backupdirectory = "c:/mybackups/" + JCalendar.getToday(); CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_FREEZE_DATABASE()"); cs.execute(); cs.close(); // user supplied code to take full backup of "backupdirectory" // now unfreeze the database once backup has completed: CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_UNFREEZE_DATABASE()"); cs.execute(); cs.close();

seg-source.mrk: String backupdirectory = "c:/mybackups/" + JCalendar.getToday(); CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_FREEZE_DATABASE()"); cs.execute(); cs.close(); // user supplied code to take full backup of "backupdirectory" // now unfreeze the database once backup has completed: CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_UNFREEZE_DATABASE()"); cs.execute(); cs.close();

target.mrk: String backupdirectory = "c:/mybackups/" + JCalendar.getToday(); CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_FREEZE_DATABASE()"); cs.execute(); cs.close(); // user supplied code to take full backup of "backupdirectory" // now unfreeze the database once backup has completed: CallableStatement cs = conn.prepareCall ("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_UNFREEZE_DATABASE()"); cs.execute(); cs.close();
